direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods deal with the namespace awareness setting of the W3CDom instance.
The convert method relies on the namespace awareness setting to create W3C nodes from jsoup nodes.
Both methods handle exceptions related to namespace configuration and XPath evaluation.

enhanced_by.reason: Initializing the DocumentBuilderFactory with namespace awareness is a prerequisite for the namespaceAware method.
The convert method must be invoked after setting the namespace awareness to ensure the correct conversion of jsoup nodes to W3C nodes.
The selectXpath method can be used to verify the correctness of the namespace configuration after setting the namespace awareness.
